name: Md Kabirul Hassan
title: Software Engineer
tagline: Building elegant solutions with modern web technologies

highlights: Maintained a web application serving 5000+ users in banks, NBFCs and internal users using the Next.js technology stack
Developed a framework with an automated feature that extracts information from different forms to generate legal reports, drafting 350+ reports per day
Built a specialized ReactJS library for PDF highlighting with intuitive page navigation and OCR translation integration
Designed and implemented robust frameworks to manage and integrate new report types, improving data processing accuracy
Developed and optimized complex MongoDB aggregations for efficient data querying and analysis
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to ensure seamless integration and deployment of new features
Integrated Salesforce CPQ services into existing PQW quoting workspace for 700+ users by developing Apex controller classes and triggers
Enhanced UX by developing frontend with Lightning Web Components and Aura Components
Contributed to HyperGrid in-house product by fixing production bugs and implementing new features with LWC

projects.name: URL Shortener
projects.description: A full-stack URL shortening service with analytics
highlights: Developed a full-stack web application with Node.js REST API and Angular frontend
Implemented URL shortening functionality accessible via both API and UI
Built analytics dashboard showing click statistics categorized by browsers

projects.name: Bits2Bytes2k22
